name: Garden Decorator
description:
Have as much fun as you can possibly have while owning your very own garden! The kids will learn a lot about chores, and the time it takes to create something beautiful. There are so many things to do and so much fun to be had. Clean your garden, decorate your garden, sell the flowers you make by creating beautiful floral creations. Children & adults alike will have a lot of fun playing this!

Features:

- Kid friendly
- Create your own garden
- Customize your garden
- Plant flowers & vegetables
- Create beautiful floral creations
- Sell you flowers
- Play memory & other fun mini games
- Absolutely free to play
- Much, Much more!
